title: Network-Based Social Expertise Improvement Course: Self-Efficacy Enhancement Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Tool Proficiency and Practical Experience in Social Sector Operations
context.additional_context: Practitioners need network-based learning environments aligned with work relevance. Provides immersive networking experiences via VR simulations.

learning_goals: Within 6 months, learners can build a personalized learning network (PLN) and maintain ongoing relationships with ≥3 experts.
In a blog-based learning community, learners can demonstrate practical competencies by presenting topics and providing feedback ≥2 times monthly.
Learners achieved a 15% improvement in self-efficacy scale after conducting two or more VR networking sessions with social field experts.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
